text.0:
Starting now :backhand_index_pointing_right: NEWS CLUB: What Now?

A new live stream series from the best of the UK's Independent Media. Talking about what's in, and behind, the news w/ @natalieben, @FerretScot, @BylineTimes & more.

Watch here :backhand_index_pointing_right: https://t.co/dOBw77k6oZ https://t.co/46EaKvPWSt
text.1: Scotland's health secretary wanted to suspend freedom of information (FoI) legislation in response to the coronavirus pandemic, according to internal government emails obtained by The Ferret. https://t.co/CkXeJmMT4t
text.2:
:megaphone:Support the first livestream of News Club UK taking at 5pm tonight!
Guests this week:
@natalieben
Rob Edwards (@FerretScot)
Stephen Colegrave (@BylineTimes)
Roshan Lal (@GreenNewDealUK)
Watch, leave comments, ask questions! Link: https://t.co/rfvrXLFZvV
text.3: Thanks to Newsclub UK for inviting us to take part in their first live stream, starting at 5pm this afternoon. Looking forward to talking about marine wildlife, and much else. https://t.co/8TpmO4zWMe
text.4: Last month I reported for @FerretScot that fewer than half of the homes promised under these schemes had actually been built; however, campaigners I spoke to said that they wanted them to continue, which the government has now confirmed. https://t.co/f13MfPTcdL
